title: Great company
pros: Leadership is solid and proven track record.
cons: Have to wear numerous different hats to be successful.

title: Administrative Assistant
pros: Love the people here in the office, they are so friendly and helpful. Job is really easy, sometimes there's plenty do to and other times there isn't anything to do but read. Hours are 8-5 but they are flexible and understanding. Great place to work!
cons: Sometimes it can get a little boring during the slow times, but that doesn't last very long fortunately and you can always ask someone else if they need help with a project if you are really looking for something to do.

title: Good Company
pros: The people are very friendly, easy going and quick to help fellow co-workers. Benefits are great. The organization promotes and encourages a healthy lifestyle through motivation and a perks/benefits. They promote within. Great work-life balance.
cons: Smaller organization so little opportunity, if any, for advancement. Lacks fundamentals in managing employees and people, resulting in issues that have the potential to escalate over time.

title: Great place to work
pros: People were very nice and genuinely cared.
cons: Really no cons I can think of.

title: Great job.
cons: Climb the company ladder. Quarterly reporting

title: Amazing Company
cons: I did not experience any cons working for EastGroup

title: East group
pros: Good working environment and good management
cons: It has no Work life balance
